title: Production-Based Online Workshop for Enhancing Design Literacy

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational design concepts and basic proficiency in digital tools
context.additional_context: Production activities in personal spaces considering COVID-19 situations, utilizing smartphones for collaboration and feedback

learning_goals: Learners can produce at least three design prototypes using everyday materials.
Learners can document and share at least two creative solutions to problems encountered during the production process.
Learners can provide structured feedback in at least three stages on design works through peer evaluation.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
